about_section.title: ABOUT
about_section.main_description: Tantai is a business specializing in agricultural products, especially coffee. With extensive experience, we connect closely from farmers, traders to domestic and international customers, committed to bringing high-quality products and professional services.
about_section.secondary_description: With over a decade of experience in agricultural products, Tantai continuously expands its scale and improves quality, focusing on domestic trade, export business, and warehouse services with key products such as coffee, rubber, and cashew nuts. At the same time, we invest heavily in modern warehouse systems and logistics, ready to serve customers.
about_section.image1_alt: Basket of red coffee cherries held by person wearing checkered shirt with green coffee leaves
about_section.image2_alt: Farmers harvesting coffee plants in green hilly area wearing yellow and blue jackets

warehouse_investment.title: Warehouse & Processing Investment
items: Investing in smart agricultural warehouse systems and modern processing.

warehouse_service.title: Warehouse Service Development
items: Leading in trade chains, deep processing, and exports.

products_section.title: TANTAI'S BUSINESS PRODUCT LINES
products_section.center_image_alt: Lush green coffee plantation landscape with mountains and blue sky

coffee.name: Coffee
coffee.description: Coffee is one of Vietnam's key export items. Tantai Company provides the highest quality and most reliable coffee to customers.

tapioca.name: Tapioca Starch
tapioca.description: Tapioca starch is widely used in the food industry. Tantai Company has been investing heavily in tapioca starch production and is highly regarded by partners for its quality.

star_anise.name: Star Anise
star_anise.description: Star anise, a popular spice originating from Vietnam and China. Tantai Company produces and exports high-quality star anise to many international markets such as Asia, EU, and the US.

rubber.name: Natural Rubber
rubber.description: With a large raw material area, advanced production technology, and a team of experienced experts, Tantai Company provides high-quality rubber products for domestic and international markets.

cashew.name: Cashew Nuts
cashew.description: A globally popular food. Tantai Company supplies whole and roasted cashew kernels, ensuring high quality according to International standards.

cinnamon.name: Cinnamon
cinnamon.description: Vietnam is one of the world's leading suppliers of high-quality cinnamon. Tantai Company is a leading producer and exporter of organic cinnamon, aiming to plant 1,000 new hectares annually by 2030.

warehouse_section.title: FACTORY - WAREHOUSE
warehouse_section.image1_alt: Interior of a large warehouse with forklifts and stacks of pallets
warehouse_section.image2_alt: Forklift lifting white sacks inside a warehouse with warm lighting
warehouse_section.image3_alt: Warehouse loading dock with pallets and a truck backed up to the door
warehouse_section.image4_alt: Two people wearing hardhats discussing inside a warehouse aisle

news_section.heading: Many opportunities for coffee export growth
news_section.description: According to the General Department of Customs, from the beginning of 2024 to October 15, Vietnam exported 1.13 million tons of coffee with a turnover of 4.44 billion USD, a decrease of 11.1% in volume but an increase of 39.1% in value compared to the same period in 2023.

item1.title: Coffee exports for the 2023/2024 crop year exceed $5 billion
item1.alt: Close-up of hands holding red coffee cherries with some falling

item2.title: Open door for coffee exports in 2024 to conquer new heights
item2.alt: Close-up image of roasted coffee beans in a container

item3.title: Coffee exports for the 2023/2024 crop year exceed $5 billion
item3.alt: Close-up of hands holding red coffee cherries with some falling

item4.title: Open door for coffee exports in 2024 to conquer new heights
item4.alt: Close-up image of roasted coffee beans in a container

hero.title: About Us
hero.description: Tantai Trading is a leading company providing professional business solutions in Vietnam. We are dedicated to helping businesses grow and succeed.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2020, Tantai Trading began with a simple vision: to help Vietnamese businesses unlock their full potential through innovative and effective business solutions.
story.paragraph2: From humble beginnings with a small team of 5 members, we have grown into a company of over 50 dedicated specialists in various fields.
story.paragraph3: Our mission remains unchanged: to provide high-quality, personalized, and effective services that help our clients achieve their business goals.

team.title: Leadership Team
team.description: Our talented and diverse leadership team, with extensive experience across many fields, is the foundation for Tantai Trading's success.

values.title: Core Values
values.description: These values shape every decision and action we take.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We prioritize honesty and transparency in every interaction with clients and partners.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly seek new and creative approaches to solve complex challenges.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We are committed to delivering the highest quality in every aspect of our work.

cta.title: Grow With Us
cta.description: Join our team and be part of a success journey.

footer.slogan: Providing professional agricultural products to customers of all sizes.

contact_info.head_office: Head Office: Khu phố 2, Thị trấn Tân Nghĩa, Huyện Hàm Tâm, Tỉnh Bình Thuận, Việt Nam
